page.title: 13Recreation around Langho
page.content: Many types of recreation are apparent in the area . Local public houses run "knock-out" football games . There is a recreation field and playgrounds for children's games . Wilpshire golf course is well patronized as is a local riding school offering indoor and outdoor lessons . Rambling in the local countryside is a popular pastime . The reservoirs draw birdwatchers and fishermen . Microlight aircraft and hang-gliders occasionally pass overhead . A rare though lovely sight is falcons from a local falconry club . Sadly television viewing is the most popular indoor pastime though 1 or 2 homes have pool tables . Many homes have home computers .
